name: Tome (Sean Nikkel)
description:
This game doesn't have an objective. Just wander around and look at some books.

Based on the Library of Babel. The library is procedural and infinite, and is made of hexagons containing books with random text.

I made this using Unreal Engine 4 and Blender to practice working with them.

Controls:

  • Normal
    • WASD - Move
    • Space - Jump
    • Shift - Sprint
    • E - Interact
    • Hold Esc - Quit
    • Walk into seats - Sit
  • Holding book
    • Left click - Next page
    • Right click - Previous page
    • E - Place
    • Hold E - Throw

Credit:

New Direction by Kevin MacLeod
